keyEvents.title: Laboon's Backstory Revealed at Twin Cape
keyEvents.description: Crocus reveals the history of Laboon and the Rumbar Pirates at Twin Cape, where Laboon has been waiting for 50 years.
keyEvents.significance: Twin Cape serves as the location where one of the series' most important promises was made and where Laboon continues to wait.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Promise to Laboon
keyEvents.description: At Twin Cape, Luffy makes his promise to return and fight Laboon again, creating a new bond of hope.
keyEvents.significance: Twin Cape becomes the site of a promise that will span the entire series and give Laboon new purpose.

keyEvents.title: Departure from Twin Cape
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats depart from Twin Cape toward Whisky Peak, beginning their true Grand Line adventure.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the end of the Reverse Mountain arc and the beginning of the Whisky Peak arc.

keyEvents.title: Laboon's Self-Destructive Ramming
keyEvents.description: Revealed that Laboon has been ramming Reverse Mountain for 50 years, trying to destroy it to return to the West Blue.
keyEvents.significance: The Red Line at Reverse Mountain bears the scars of Laboon's grief, showing the physical impact of his emotional pain.

description: The first island on one of the seven routes from Reverse Mountain into the Grand Line. Home to Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday, and secretly a Baroque Works base.

keyEvents.title: Whisky Peak Mentioned as Destination
keyEvents.description: Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday request passage to Whisky Peak, establishing it as the Straw Hats' first Grand Line island destination.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the next arc where the Straw Hats will encounter Baroque Works in full force.

notableFeatures: First island on one route of the Grand Line

description: The final island of the Grand Line, reached only by Gol D. Roger and his crew. The location of the One Piece treasure and the endpoint of the Grand Line.

keyEvents.title: First Mention of Laugh Tale
keyEvents.description: Crocus reveals that only Gol D. Roger's crew has reached the final island, Laugh Tale.
keyEvents.significance: First explicit mention of the ultimate destination in the series, establishing the end goal for Luffy's journey.

notableFeatures: Final island of the Grand Line
Only reached by Gol D. Roger's crew
Location of the One Piece treasure
